segments.text: I am observing a typical kitchen scene, though something feels off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing at the sink, quite absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the faucet is running, and the water is steadily filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my, the water is now spilling over the front edge of the sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a continuous sheet of water down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is definitely forming on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly baffled by her complete lack of reaction to the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause some serious water damage if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely lost in the simple act of polishing that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could somehow alert her to the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
